display.title: True Distillation: Fuel
description: Here are the four most relevant &&dHydrocarbons&&r you will be obtaining from distilling Steam-Cracked Fuels.
You will want to set this up &&lbefore&&r moving to &&1IV&&r.
&&aSteam-Cracked Light Fuel&&r as input is probably the most favorable, but you are free to experiment.
We know what you're thinking - something along the lines of "&&7&&oThat Carbon output is just SO infuriating! It's ruining my automation!&&r".
Enable Item Voiding (in the controller GUI) if you don't want to build an Output Bus.
